entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
